name: Overrun
description:
Overrun is a extremely hard, arcade twin-stick shooter. Fight your way through waves of enemies, but try not to get overrun.

FEATURES:


  • Arcade-style gameplay with unlimited waves of enemies
  • Randomly spawned enemies increasing in difficulty
  • Gain extra health and coins after completing each wave
  • Unlock new and unique weapons
  • Mix and match dozens of weapon combinations to suit your own playstyle
  • Upgrade existing weapons to give you the upper hand

EXTRAS:

  • Steam cloud saving
  • Steam stats and achievements
  • Chiptune style music
